list.name: planet
question: Men Are from Mars, Women Are from
Venus. Where are you from?

list.name: excited
question: How much excited are you to join our 2
weeks web design?

list.name: reason
question: Why did you choose to join our
workshops above all others?

list.name: expectation
question: What do you expect to learn in the
workshops?

answer.placeholder: How to build a paper rocket?

list.name: theOneThing
question: What is the one thing that you wish to
learn in the workshops?

answer.placeholder: How to build a space ship?

list.name: plan
question: Which plan do you think fits you the
most?

list.name: timing
question: Which timing do you think fits you the
most?

list.name: location
question: Do you prefer any institute or location to
launch our workshops in? The hall should
fit around 30 participants with their
laptops.

list.name: message
question: Do you have any special message you
wish me to know about?
